title: Stossel.2010.XviD-skJGZV6z + Specials
description:
Thanks go out to skJGZV6z for posting these back in the day. I changed the filenames slightly somewhere along the line to make these episodes work with XBMC. Changed the dates on the file names from 20091210 to 2009.12.10. Sorry if this causes a problem but from what I can tell not a lot of people out there seeding these and it would be very inconvenient for me to keep 2 versions of the files. So, here they are.

This should be every episode released in 2010 + the two episodes released in 2009. I'm going off this list; http://www.trakt.tv/shows/stossel/seasons/1. The only episode not included is "You Owe $200,000 To The Fed". If I remember right that's a duplicate entry and can be ignored.

Specials not included. They will be posted in a separate Stossel Specials pack.

These are not scene rips.

This was deleted and reposted with specials added. I was going to post a separate torrent with all of the specials but it seems better to do it this way. Here's what was added.

2010.07.01-Stossel-[What's Great About America].Fox Business.CF
2010.09.25-The Battle for the Future-with John Stossel
2010.12.17-Politicians Promises Gone Wrong-Stossel.CF

Not sure if they're all skJGZV6z rips or not. If it doesn't have a Fox.Business.CF probably not.

_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2_,-'2

John F. Stossel is an American consumer reporter, investigative journalist, author, libertarian columnist, and former co-anchor for the ABC News show 20/20. In this show he looks at consumer-focused topics, such as civil liberties, the business of health care, and free trade.
